Description:
Detects suspicious activity in which the MSExchangeMailboxReplication process writes .asp and .apsx files to disk, which could be a sign of ProxyShell exploitation

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious MSExchangeMailboxReplication ASPX Write
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\msexchangemailboxreplication.exe' and (filepath like '%.aspx' or filepath like '%.asp')
